segments.text: What a strange tableau unfolds before my eyes in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman continues her domestic chore, completely isolated in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's oblivious to the gathering water around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And she's oblivious to the daring raid occurring just behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a peculiar blend of routine activity and impending chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stillness of the garden seen through the window offers such a stark contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything outside looks calm and well-ordered, almost mocking the interior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water pooling and imagine the slippery conditions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just a matter of time before someone slips and falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene feels like a snapshot right before everything goes wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the crash of dishes and the splash of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of unawareness in an adult is genuinely frustrating to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR
